issues.description:
Shell MFE: Module Federation host, layout, auth guard, menu. Port 3000. ✅ Concluído.
Confluence: 
https://gaqno.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/15794177
AI MFE. Base path /ai. Port 3002. ✅ Concluído.
Finance MFE. Base path /finance. Port 3005. ✅ Concluído.
RPG MFE. Base path /rpg. Port 3007. ✅ Concluído.
SSO service. Port 4001. gaqno_sso_db. Auth, users, tenants, branches, menu, permissions. ✅ Concluído.
RPG service. Port 4007. gaqno_rpg_db. Sessions, characters, campaigns, narrator, WebSocket. ✅ Concluído.
Finance service. Port 4005. gaqno_finance_db. Transactions, categories, credit cards. ✅ Concluído.
SSO MFE: Auth UI, login, register. Base path /auth. Port 3001. ✅ Concluído.
PDV MFE. Base path /pdv. Port 3006. ✅ Concluído.
Admin MFE. Base path /organization. Port 3009. ✅ Concluído.
SaaS MFE. Base path /sass. Port 3008. ✅ Concluído.
Omnichannel MFE. Base path /omnichannel. Port 3010. ✅ Concluído.
AI service. Port 4002. gaqno_ai_db. ✅ Concluído.
PDV service. Port 4006. gaqno_pdv_db. Sales, products, customers, PDV. ✅ Concluído.
Omnichannel service. Port 4008. gaqno_omnichannel_db. Channels, conversations, messages. ✅ Concluído.

issues.summary: Husky + Commitlint + Lint-staged — Git hooks setup
issues.description:
Implementação de Git hooks com Husky. Escopo: Husky, Commitlint, Lint-staged, hooks pre-commit, commit-msg, pre-push. Confluence: 
https://gaqno.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/15859713

issues.summary: commit-msg — Validação de mensagens de commit
issues.description: Hook commit-msg: valida formato conventional commits via commitlint. Tipos: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, build, ci, chore, revert. Header max 100 chars. AC: .husky/commit-msg existe; npx commitlint --edit $1; commitlint.config.js

fields.summary: Husky + Commitlint + Lint-staged — Git hooks setup

issuetype.description: Uma coleção de bugs, histórias e tarefas.
issuetype.name: Epic

issues.summary: pre-commit — Lint-staged e lint em pacotes afetados
issues.description: Hook pre-commit: lint-staged (eslint --fix em *.ts, *.tsx, *.js, *.jsx) + turbo run lint. AC: .husky/pre-commit existe; npx lint-staged; lint-staged config em package.json

issues.summary: pre-push — Testes completos antes do push
issues.description: Hook pre-push: turbo run test para garantir que testes passam antes de enviar ao remoto. AC: .husky/pre-push existe; turbo run test

issues.summary: Reduce shell responsibility and align admin platform
issues.description:
Goal:
 Shell becomes host-only; admin pages live in dedicated MFE
Business Impact:
 Faster admin evolution; smaller shell bundle; clearer boundaries
Technical Impact:
 Decoupled deploy; SRP compliance
Definition of Done:
 Shell has no pages in 
pages/admin/
; all admin routes served by gaqno-admin-ui
Confluence:
 
https://gaqno.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/15761409
 | 
https://gaqno.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/15794177
Source:
 System Architecture Auditor, Frontend Architecture Enforcer

issues.summary: Standardize API client usage and extract logic to hooks
issues.description:
Goal:
 All MFEs use frontcore API client; no logic in components
Business Impact:
 Consistent error handling; easier maintenance
Technical Impact:
 DRY; hooks pattern enforced
Definition of Done:
 finance-ui uses frontcore; no local api-client; all pages with logic have hooks
Confluence:
 
https://gaqno.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/15794177
 | 
https://gaqno.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/15859713
Source:
 Frontend Architecture Enforcer, System Architecture Auditor

issues.summary: Clarify admin/saas service evolution and DTO alignment
issues.description:
Goal:
 Documented service boundaries; DTOs implement shared interfaces
Business Impact:
 Clear ownership; scalable service growth
Technical Impact:
 Contract-first; no orphan DTOs
Definition of Done:
 admin/saas evolution documented; finance DTOs implement shared
Confluence:
 
https://gaqno.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/15826945
 | 
https://gaqno.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/15630354
Source:
 Backend Documentation Engineer, Contracts & Types Guardian

issues.summary: Achieve minimum test coverage across MFEs and services
issues.description:
Goal:
 Hooks with logic have specs; critical paths covered
Business Impact:
 Fewer regressions; confident refactors
Technical Impact:
 TDD culture; regression safety
Definition of Done:
 admin-ui, saas-ui hooks have specs; finance-ui, pdv-ui extended
Confluence:
 
https://gaqno.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/15794177
Source:
 Frontend Architecture Enforcer, Backend Documentation Engineer

issues.summary: Unify types and align DTOs with shared contracts
issues.description:
Goal:
 Single source of truth for domain types; DTOs implement shared interfaces
Business Impact:
 Fewer integration bugs; faster feature development
Technical Impact:
 No type drift; contract-first development
Definition of Done:
 backcore is type source; frontcore re-exports; finance DTOs implement CreateTransactionInput
Confluence:
 
https://gaqno.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/15630354
Source:
 Contracts & Types Guardian, System Architecture Auditor

Scope:
 @gaqno-backcore types/shared; @gaqno-frontcore re-exports
Acceptance Criteria:
frontcore re-exports from backcore
No duplicate types in frontcore/types/shared
MFEs import from frontcore
Confluence:
 
https://gaqno.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/15630354

issues.summary: Refactor monorepo: remove submodules, add CI workflows and documentation
issues.description:
Scope:
 Inline MFEs/services from submodules into workspace; add .github workflows (CI, PR gatekeeper, self-healing); add docs (confluence, agents, architecture audit); update package.json workspaces.
Acceptance Criteria:
All packages in workspace (no submodules for MFEs/services)
CI, PR gatekeeper, self-healing workflows in .github/
Documentation in docs/ (confluence, jira, architecture)

issues.summary: gaqno-rpg-ui – Align hooks to component folder structure
issues.description:
gaqno-rpg-ui currently has 40+ hooks in src/hooks/. Per architecture rules, hooks must live inside the component or page that owns them. Shared hooks go in components/shared/hooks/.
Goal: No root-level src/hooks/; all hooks under components/
/hooks/ or pages/
/hooks/
Acceptance Criteria:
src/hooks/ removed or empty
Shared hooks in components/shared/hooks/
Component hooks in components/[Component]/hooks/
Page hooks in pages/[feature]/hooks/
All imports updated
Tests pass
Confluence: 
https://gaqno-development.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/DDS/pages/688129/Frontend+Architecture+Guide
